text: Women who laugh while eating salads, what is your favourite salad to laugh with?
Have you ever seen red flags in yourself? How did you find out and address them?
What's your "when you look at someone through rose-colored glasses, all the red flags just look like flags" story?

People often say that they would marry their (coffee maker, wine glass, etc.). What inanimate object would you marry for the positive impact it has had on your life?


Not expecting NSFW, but you never know.

Women of reddit - what's a hobby you took up later in life and managed to become pretty good at?


And how did you become decent at it? What did it take? What age did you start?
Ladies who aren't into "hookup" culture, where do you find men that want something serious?
For women whose social life really started in their late 20s or 30s. How did this change come about?
If you could pick one question to be permanently banned to be asked on AskWomen - which one would it be and why?

Women in male-dominated, casual working environments, what are your summer work outfits?


I'm going to be a software engineer intern this summer and I have no idea what clothes to bring! I have a more girly style and I know it's going to be hot in California. Would love to hear what y'all wear :)

Dear Women, have you ever been in a happy relationship but just felt that longing to be single? How did it come about for you?


So, basically have you ever been in a happy relationship where nothing is really going wrong, but at the back of your mind you want to experience being single again? Or any sort of variation on this question? 

What's your story!
What’s a shallow reason you wouldn’t date a guy?
Women over the age of 25, what would you tell your 25yr old you if you could go back in time?
What product is marketed towards women in an insulting way?

How do you deal with the thought of one day losing a parent?


This is probably stemming from the fact that we (my parents and me, when I'm staying at their house) take care of my Gma who has advanced dementia. 

I've grown pretty close with my mom over the last few years. If I have a big decision to make, I call her to talk it through. If I have a bad day, I tell her. If I get great news, she's the first person I tell. She had me late in life so she is 60 while I'm 24. The concept of losing her one day actually makes me sick to my stomach and brings tears to my eyes....
How have you grown as a person recently?
What is your experience with direct purchase online only clothing brands like Asos, Cupshe, Modcloth, etc.? Which ones do you recommend and which ones would you stay away from and why?

The supplemental rules for "Mate-Free Monday" are now in effect.



Due to [popular demand](https://www.reddit.com/r/AskWomen/comments/3oef25/meta_would_you_want_to_see_a_day_in_raskwomen/), every Monday from 12am ET and (-5 GMT) until 12am on Tuesday, submissions related to dating, relationships, or attraction will be removed.;


Examples of things we'll remove:


* What do you look for in a partner?


* What does your SO do that you love/annoy you?


* Are you attracted to [feature]? (Includes celebrities)


* Is [thing] a red flag/yellow flag/dealbreaker/white flag?


* What do you think about men who eat muffins alone in coffee shops?


If you have any questions about these supplemental rules, please [message the moderators](https://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to=/r/AskWomen&subject=Questions+about+mate+free+monday) and we will be happy to discuss it with you.


~The AskWomen Mod Team
Do you have a preference on the gender of your gynecologist? Why or why not?
